PHRASE.LANG: Demon spawn may seem like an unlikely pet, but you've rescued him from the confines of the dungeon so he's eternally grateful. [#Legal]
Démon frai peut sembler comme un animal de compagnie peu probable, mais vous lui avez sauvé de l'enceinte du donjon donc il est éternellement reconnaissante.[#Legal]
Dämon laichen kann wie ein unwahrscheinlich pet erscheinen, aber Sie haben ihn aus der Enge des Kerkers gerettet, damit er ewig dankbar ist.[#Legal]
Demone micelio può sembrare un animale improbabile, ma l'hai salvato dai confini del dungeon quindi è eternamente grato.[#Legal]
Demonio semilla puede parecer una mascota poco probable, pero lo has rescatado de los confines de la mazmorra por lo que está eternamente agradecido.[#Legal]
Demon spawn may seem like an unlikely pet, but you've rescued him from the confines of the dungeon so he's eternally grateful. [#Legal]
Demon spawn may seem like an unlikely pet, but you've rescued him from the confines of the dungeon so he's eternally grateful. [#Legal]
